title: Garmin Forerunner® 955 Solar, GPS Running Smartwatch with Solar Charging Capabilities, Tailored to Triathletes, Long-Lasting Battery, Black - 010-02638-00
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › GPS, Finders & Accessories › Sports & Handheld GPS › Running GPS Units
description: Lead the pack with Forerunner® 955 Solar, the premium GPS running and triathlon smartwatch with Power Glass™ solar charging to extend battery life. The training readiness feature tells you when you’re primed for a productive session — while daily suggested workouts adapt to your performance and recovery alongside the race widget, which provides training tips, course details and completion time predictions. With morning report, you can get an overview of your sleep, recovery, training and more — as well as a picture of your overall health with heart rate variability (HRV) status (This device is intended to give an estimate of your activity and metrics). On the run, new multi-band GPS and full-color, built-in maps help you navigate confidently. And with traditional buttons and a touch display, it has never been easier to tap into your training status and know whether you’re training productively, peaking or strained. If you’re pushing toward the podium — or to the very limits — Forerunner 955 Solar is by your side with up to 20 days of battery life with solar charging in smartwatch mode (assuming all-day wear with 3 hours per day outside in 50,000 lux conditions).
features: Built with an always-on, full-color display that’s light on the wrist and easy to read even in direct sunlight

Battery life: up to 20 days of battery life in smartwatch mode for a full picture of your health — from sleep to training (assuming all-day wear with 3 hours per day outside in 50,000 lux conditions); up to 42 hours in GPS mode and up to 49 hours with solar charging (assuming continuous use for entire period in 50,000 lux conditions); up to 110 hours in UltraTrac mode with solar charging (assuming use in 50,000 lux conditions)
Click or swipe through maps and stats with traditional button controls or a new, responsive touchscreen
Whether you’re running on city streets or riding densely covered trails, Forerunner 955 provides full-color, built-in mapping to keep you on track

Access multiple global navigation satellite systems, and get access to multiple frequencies sent by navigation satellites for improved accuracy in areas where GNSS signals are reflected, weak or typically don't penetrate — giving you superior accuracy for how far and how fast you’ve run — even in challenging environments
From the moment you wake up, get a training readiness score based on your sleep quality, recovery, training and more, so you can determine whether it’s a good day to go hard — or take it easy
Get ready for your next race with race widget — which provides training tips, personalized daily suggested workouts and completion time predictions based on course details, weather and performance

Using new indicators such as HRV status, your recent exercise history and performance, get an easy insight into your overall effort with training status — and know whether you’re training productively, peaking or strained

Receive an overview of your sleep, recovery and training outlook as soon as you wake up with morning report — alongside HRV status, training readiness and weather; you can even customize your report to show what you want to see (This device is intended to give an estimate of your activity and metrics)

With HRV status, gain a deeper understanding of your overall health, recovery and training performance through heart rate variability while you sleep, based on technology developed by our Firstbeat Analytics team (This device is intended to give an estimate of your activity and metrics)

title: Apple Watch Series 9 [GPS 45mm] Smartwatch with Midnight Aluminum Case with Midnight Sport Band M/L. Fitness Tracker, ECG Apps, Always-On Retina Display, Water Resistant
inStockText: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
features: CARBON NEUTRAL — An aluminum Apple Watch Series 9 paired with the latest Sport Loop is carbon neutral. Learn more about Apple’s commitment to the environment at apple.com/2030.

WHY APPLE WATCH SERIES 9 — Your essential companion for a healthy life is now even more powerful. The S9 chip enables a superbright display and a magical new way to quickly and easily interact with your Apple Watch without touching the screen. Advanced health, safety, and activity features provide powerful insights and help when you need it. And redesigned apps in watchOS give you more information at a glance.

ADVANCED HEALTH FEATURES — Take an ECG anytime. Get notifications if you have an irregular heart rhythm. See how much time you spent in REM, Core, or Deep sleep with sleep stages. Temperature sensing provides insights into overall wellbeing and cycle tracking. And take note of your state of mind to help build emotional awareness and resilience.

A POWERFUL FITNESS PARTNER — The Workout app gives you a range of ways to train plus advanced metrics for more insights about your workout performance. And Apple Watch comes with three months of Apple Fitness+ free.

INNOVATIVE SAFETY FEATURES — Fall Detection and Crash Detection can connect you with emergency services in the event of a hard fall or a severe car crash. And Emergency SOS lets you call for help with the press of a button.

SIMPLY COMPATIBLE — It works seamlessly with your Apple devices and services. Unlock your Mac automatically. Get approximate distance and directions to your iPhone with Precision Finding on supported iPhone models. Pay and send money with Apple Pay. Apple Watch requires iPhone XS or later with the latest iOS version.
EASILY CUSTOMIZABLE — With watch bands in a range of styles, materials, and colors and fully customizable watch faces, you can change your watch to fit your mood or the moment.
INCREDIBLE DURABILITY — Tougher than tough. It’s crack resistant, IP6X-certified dust resistant, and swimproof with 50m water resistance.
STAY CONNECTED — Send a text, take a call, listen to music and podcasts, use Siri, and get notifications on the go. Apple Watch Series 9 (GPS) works with your iPhone or Wi-Fi to keep you connected.
LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See below to learn more.

description: Take charge of your health with vívosmart® 5. features: Bluetooth Call and Message Reminders: The smartwatch supports answering/making/hanging up calls, viewing call logs and storing contacts. All-day Health Monitoring: The fitness watch has real-time health monitoring functions, which can monitor heart rate in real time; automatically monitor sleep status; test blood oxygen; do breathing exercises; all-day activity tracking steps, calories, distance, etc. The data will be synchronized with the "GloryFit" application to generate a health report.

112+ Sports Modes and 200+ Dials: The smartwatch provides 112+ indoor and outdoor sports modes, such as running, cycling, skipping rope, walking, basketball, football, etc. You can switch dials on the smartwatch. 1.39" HD Touch Screen and Long Battery Life: The fitness tracker is equipped with a 1.39-inch round touch screen, large screen, high-definition display, color reproduction, sensitive touch, and scratch-resistant. More Functions: The smart watches also has a variety of functions, such as: music control, weather forecast, remote photography, stopwatch, timer, alarm clock, find mobile phone, raise your hand to light up the screen, calculator, calendar, sedentary reminder, voice assistant, sound and vibration, flashlight, adjust brightness, do not disturb mode, etc. Download the "GloryFit" application to give you more intelligent experience.

IP68 Waterproof and Wide Compatibility: The IP68 daily waterproof design of the smart health watch is not afraid of your sweating and hand washing behavior, providing convenience for your daily life. The fitness tracker watch is widely compatible with all iOS/Android smartphones, bringing you a convenient and pleasant experience.

Give You the Ultimate Experience: Wearing this S51 - Smart watches give you a better experience. Multiple sports modes allow you to get a good partner for your sports/fitness, multiple health monitoring makes your life healthier, and multiple practical functions make your life more convenient.

description: The Samsung Galaxy Fit 3 is set to redefine wearable fitness technology with its cutting-edge features and sleek design. With anticipation building, this new addition to the Galaxy Fit series promises to offer an enhanced user experience. The Galaxy Fit 3 boasts a vibrant 1.6-inch sAMOLED display, offering crystal-clear resolution for easy viewing. Its efficient 208mAh battery ensures up to 13 days of usage without the need for frequent charging, perfect for the active and on-the-go lifestyle. For fitness enthusiasts, the Galaxy Fit 3 is a dream come true, featuring 101 workout modes to cater to every type of exercise and six auto-tracking modes for effortless activity recording. The device is not only powerful with its 16MB of RAM and 256MB of storage for smooth performance but also durable, featuring an all-aluminum body and glass display. It's available in stylish color options including gray, silver, and pink gold, ensuring it complements any personal style. The Galaxy Fit 3 stands out from its predecessor with significant improvements. It's 46% larger yet 10% thinner, offering a more prominent display without adding bulk to your wrist. The device also advances in health tracking with enhanced sleep analysis, sleep coaching, blood oxygen monitoring, and even snoring detection, alongside an expanded range of workout presets and exercise auto-detection features. While eagerly awaiting its official release, the Galaxy Fit 3 is already generating excitement among tech enthusiasts and fitness buffs alike. This device is not just a fitness tracker; it's a comprehensive wellness companion designed to fit seamlessly into your lifestyle.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Smart Watch for Men Women Fitness Tracker Make/Answer Call Watch IPX8 Waterproof Digital Smart Watch With Heart Rate Blood Pressure Spo2 Sleep Running Step Tracker 
Features: 
1. Full Touch Fitness Watch: Stylish and Simple Appearance, 1.85" HD Full Touch Screen. Easy Control with the Sensitive Touch Screen. Watch screen will light up every time you raise your hand. 
2. Bluetooth Call Smartwatch: You can directly use this watch to answer make calls/play music/read messages/store contacts/view call history. 
3. Music Playback and Control: You can carry music directly through the watch. 
4. Pedometer Step Tracker Watch: Track your steps, calories burned, distance, pace, heart rate change, duration of movement. 
5. 112+ Modes Activity Tracker: Support 112+ Multi-Sport Modes (walking, running, cycling, Basketball,et.) 
6. Heart Rate/Blood Oxygen Monitor Watch: 24 hours continuous monitoring. 
7. Sleep Monitor Watch: Automatically monitor and analyze sleep quality during night. 
8. Alarm: Can set up to multiple Alarm Clocks. 
9. Smart Watch with Notifications: Receive Call / SMS Notification from Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp,LinkedIn, Instagram etc.(Can not reply it) 
10.IPX8 Water Resistant : IPX8 waterproof, which has a good waterproof effect for daily life, such as: washing hands, anti-sweat, anti-rain, etc. 
Bluetooth smartwatch with text and call 
With this bluetooth call smartwatch, you don't miss any important calls,by using clear waterproof speakers. You can make, answer and refuse a call on your wrist, also receive message/app notification(including SMS,Whatsapp, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook messaging, LinkedIn, and more). Never miss a call and a message. In addition, you can also listen to music directly through the smart watch, get lost in the music, enjoy a colorful and intelligent life.
With all notifications displayed on your wrist and alerted by vibration, you can keep your phone in your pocket without missing any important calls or messages when you're out walking, exercising, or seeing friends.
Add Your Contacts: Smartwatch can add up to 20 frequent contacts, view recent call history, make calls from the watch dialer
Fitness watches for men women with 112+ Sport Modes 
This fitness tracker watch automatically and accurately track count your full-day steps, calories burned, distances, miles walked and duration to get a clear situation of your daily exercise.
The square watches for men has 112+ sports modes to meet your various sports styles. You can choose the corresponding mode according to your sports (Walk,Run,on foot,Cycling,Skipping,Rope ,Work out etc.)
After exercise, check the data on the exercise watch or related app (exercising time, average heart rate, distance, steps, calories).You can make better adjustments by analyzing these data.And exercise your sports data through the exercise tracker watch to arrange fitness plan.
Smartwatch with Heart Rate Monitor 
This watch equipped with the advanced self-developed optical sensor and a powerful sensor engine, the accuracy of data monitoring has been effectively improved by 23%.
Our smartwatch real-time track your heart rate, blood oxygen, and sleep, pays attention to your health at all times, records physical changes, and helps you better understand your health.
You can also view recent data changes in the APP, as well as professional advice on your health status.Master the first-hand dynamics of heart rate, blood oxygen, to realize all-around health protection.
Sleep Tracker with Alarm Clock 
Adopting advanced motion sensors, this watch automatically monitor sleep status (deep sleep, light sleep and wake up time, and provide a comprehensive sleep quality analysis to help you adjust your sleep habits.
This classic digital watch can wake you up with alarm clock, you can set up to alarms in our app.
1.85" HD Screen ＆ Customizable 
Choose from over 100 watch faces to match your style, or personalize your smartwatch with your own photos.
1.85" inch full touch screen. Watch face will light up automatically when you lift and twist your wrist.
Easier to read with five levels of brightness options in the sun or dark.
Smart watch come with 2 watch bands of different colors
IPX8 Waterproof Smart Watch 
This smart watch is IPX8 waterproof ,you can wear it during outdoor activities, rainy day, washing hand. 
Fitness watch with Countdown and stopwatch 
This Smartwatch has Countdown 、stopwatch and timer function.Activate the stopwatch function on the screen and record the exercise time. You can also use it to calculate more things. 
Remote Camera 
Take a picture of your phone remotely with your smartwatch, upload the photo as your dial! 
How to connect the smart watch? 
A: First of all, please be sure to connect our smart watch through the "FitCloudPro" APP. 
1. Tum on the "Bluetooth" function of your phone. 
2. Open the "Google Play" or the “APP Store". 
3. Search for "FitCloudPro" APP and download it. 
4. Open the APP, click "Please connect device", click "Select device",find “S37" and bind it. 
B: Perform the following steps to enable the answer/call function. 
1. After selecting “S37"to connect, on the mobile phone system pop-up pairing request, select pairing. 
2. Tum on the call Bluetooth switch on the watch (used whent he watch cannot make calls and play media sound). 
3. In the phone settings, in the system bluetooth, turn on these permissions of the “S37". 
4.Once connected, you could use the watch to answer/make calls anytime. 
If you don't need to use the call function, you can turn off the answer/call function so that the battery can last longer.

Does this watch come with a charging cable? And are the watch bands replaceable? 
Yes, it comes in the watch box with replaceable bands and a charging cable. You can search "24mm Watch Straps" or other alternative words on Amazon to find one that suits you. 
Can I switch languages? 
Yes, you can choose the language in the VeryFit app. The smart watch supports English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese and Russian for now. 
Is it compatible with Android phones? 
Yes, it works for iOS and Android phones. 
How can I change the weather from Celsius to Farenheit? And the distance km to miles? 
Open the VeryFit app, click "My" (the last icon at the bottom) => "Unit Setup" => "Temperature"/"Distance" => "Fahrenheit °F"/"Mile". And then sync with the watch. 
How can I contact the seller if I have any other questions? 
You can send your questions to the support email, which is printed on the package. Or you can enter our store and click the button below the store name. We will response as fast as we can to help you. Thank you!

title: Garmin Venu® Sq 2 GPS Smartwatch, All-Day Health Monitoring, Long-Lasting Battery Life, AMOLED Display, Cool Mint

breadCrumbs: Electronics › Wearable Technology › Smartwatches
description: Let’s find a new way to move with the Venu® Sq 2 smartwatch. Featuring a bright AMOLED display, this GPS smartwatch combines daily style with health monitoring and fitness features that inspire you to connect mind and body. With up to 11 days of battery life, you won’t have to take off your watch every night to charge it — which means a more complete 24/7 picture of your health. Get heart rate, sleep score, stress tracking, Body Battery™ energy levels and so much more (This device is intended to give an estimate of your activity and metrics). With 25 preloaded sports apps for indoor or outdoor activities, you can try something new, including running, cardio, strength, HIIT and more. Never miss a call or text with smart notifications delivered to your wrist when paired to your Apple® or Android™ smartphone. Get detailed health and fitness data plus workouts in the free Garmin Connect™ smartphone app.
features: See everything clearly with large, easy-to-read text on the bright AMOLED display that includes an always-on mode, perfect for quick glances
With up to 11 days of battery life in smartwatch mode, you won’t have to take your watch off every night to charge — which means a more complete 24/7 picture of your health

Health is important to you, so monitor everything from your Body Battery energy levels, sleep score, respiration, hydration and stress to women’s health, heart rate and more (This device is intended to give an estimate of your activity and metrics)
Find new ways to keep your body moving with more than 25 built-in indoor and GPS sports apps, including walking, running, cycling, HIIT, swimming, golf and many more
Never miss a call, text or social media alert from your paired Apple or Android smartphone with smart notifications delivered right to your wrist

Use free preloaded workouts that include cardio, yoga, strength, HIIT and even Pilates; create your own in the Garmin Connect smartphone app, or try Garmin Coach free adaptive training plans to help you prepare for your next running challenge
With a supported bank, leave your cash and cards at home; Garmin Pay contactless payments let you pay for purchases on the go

Head out with peace of mind with safety and tracking features, including incident detection (during select activities) and Assistance, both of which send messages with your live location to emergency contacts (Requires setup and your smartphone to be in an area with network coverage where data connectivity is available)
Personalize with watch faces, apps and widgets from our Connect IQ Store, and review your health and fitness data in detail with the free Garmin Connect smartphone app

title: FITVII Ole Fitness Tracker, 1.6'' AMOLED Fitness Watch with 24/7 Heart Rate and Blood Pressure Monitor, Blood Oxygen Sleep Tracking Step Calories Counter IP68 Waterproof Activity Tracker for Women Men
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Fitness Technology › Activity & Fitness Trackers
features: 1.6" AMOLED HD Display: Step up your fitness game with the upgraded FITVII Ole fitness tracker, boasting a brilliant 1.6-inch AMOLED color HD screen. Enjoy sharp, vibrant visuals and a sleek metal body for a fashionable and lightweight look.

Heart Rate & Blood Pressure Monitoring: Monitor your heart rate and blood pressure trends 24/7 with the FITVII tracker. Get valuable insights to aid your exercise planning and promote a healthy lifestyle. (Not intended for medical use)

Blood Oxygen & Sleep Tracking: FITVII Ole fitness tracker can measure your blood oxygen saturation and help you understand your physical state. Great for high-intensity workouts and sports like marathons and gym workouts. Better sleep can power your days. Track your time in light and deep sleep to better understand your sleep quality each night.

All-Day Activity Tracking: Automatically log your steps, distance, and calories burned throughout the day to keep track of your activity levels. With over 100+ sport modes, you can track virtually any type of exercise, from running and cycling to yoga and dancing.

Manual Time and Date Setting: Enjoy the convenience of setting the time and date directly on your tracker, allowing for independent use without needing an app or smartphone. (Some functionality is limited in this case)

Smart Features: FITVII Ole fitness watch offers a variety of intelligent functions. Customize your watch face, receive call and message notifications, find your phone, check the weather, get drinking and sedentary reminders, set alarms, control your music, and track your menstrual cycle.

Compatibility: The FITVII Ole Fitness Tracker works with Android 5.0 & iOS 10 or newer smartphones with Bluetooth 4.0, but is not compatible with PCs, iPads, or Tablets. Enjoy up to 7-10 days of battery life on a single charge, depending on usage and other factors.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Why Choose the FITVII Ole Fitness Tracker? 
'Ole'—a word that embodies passion, joy, and encouragement. 
The FITVII Ole fitness tracker is designed to bring these emotions into consumers' lives. More than just a fitness tracker, the FITVII Ole symbolizes self-motivation, a healthy lifestyle, and a zest for living. We want everyone who uses the FITVII Ole to feel this inner joy and embrace the beauty of life. 
Let’s cheer 'Ole' together, and may each day be filled with happiness and energy. 
FITVII Service Pledge 
Our Fitness Tracker delivers every detail promised!
Experience top-notch fitness tracker at an unbeatable price.
Enjoy 1 year of replacement service.
Take advantage of our no-hassle, 15-day return or exchange service. 
For any concerns, our Amazon support team is ready to assist.
Enhanced Visual Experience 
The AMOLED screen technology brings you vibrant and rich colors with deep blacks, offering a wider color gamut to make every image come to life.
Thanks to its independent lighting pixels, the AMOLED screen eliminates the need for a backlight module, enhancing energy efficiency and significantly extending battery life with the same capacity.
This fitness tracker watch offers over 200 beautiful watch faces to choose from, and also supports custom uploads so you can personalize your interface with your favorite images, making your style truly unique.
The FITVII Ole fitness tracker features a high-brightness design that keeps the screen content clearly visible even under strong sunlight. Additionally, it offers soft dark tones during nighttime use, reducing eye strain.
Heart Rate Monitor: The Ole features advanced heart rate tracking technology, providing you with accurate and real-time heart rate data. Whether you’re engaged in daily workouts, running, or high-intensity interval training, this fitness tracker helps you stay within your optimal heart rate zone for peak fitness results.
Blood Pressure Monitor: With each manual reading, you can review your historical blood pressure averages and long-term trends in the app, gaining valuable insights into your health status.
Blood Oxygen Monitor: Keep tabs on your Sp-02 levels with this smartwatch, whether you’re scaling mountains or simply engaging in daily activities, for a comprehensive view of your health and peak athletic performance.
Sleep Monitor: The FITVII Ole fitness tracker not only records your bedtime and wake-up time but also details the duration of deep and light sleep. This comprehensive data helps you manage and adjust your sleep schedule more easily, ensuring you reach your optimal state.
Scientific Sleep Monitoring 
Enhanced by automatic sleep tracking, you can grasp your sleep patterns and monitor your light and deep sleep cycles, 
gaining deeper insights into your nightly sleep quality, thereby better helping you achieve your wellness goals.
100+ Exercise Modes 
The fitness tracker automatically records your exercise data, including steps taken, calories burned, and workout heart rate. 
You can monitor your progress in the FitCloudPro app, tracking how your activities accumulate and understanding which exercises contribute most to your overall totals.
Message Notifications 
This fitness tracker pairs with your phone for call and text notifications, and views from all apps.
It updates weather in real-time, manages alarms, timers, and stopwatches.
Control camera and music, get sedentary reminders, and customize watch faces—for maximum daily convenience.
Female Health Management 
Women's Health Tracking. Focusing on every woman's wellness journey.
With this feature, you can track menstrual cycles and symptoms, record changes, predict ovulation, and gain deeper insights into your body, empowering you to plan ahead for a healthier life.
IP68 Waterproof 
This activity tracker can withstand submersion in up to 1 meter of water for a maximum duration of 30 minutes without causing damage. 
Whether you're out in the rain, washing your hands, or going about your daily activities, it's ready for your adventures.
Compact Size & Extended Battery Life 
Charges fully in just 1 hour
Battery Capacity up to 180mAh
Supports normal use for 3 to 5 days
Offers standby time of up to 15 days
Additional Features 
Password Lock Screen: Secure your personal privacy and ensure the safety of your data.
Stopwatch: Accurately record your exercise data, with the capability to track up to 10 lap times per session, helping you improve your workout efficiency.
Vibrating Alarm: Silently wake you up in the morning, maintaining tranquility without disturbing others.
Timer: Concentrate on your tasks with dedicated countdowns, helping you manage your time effectively.
Calculator: Despite the screen size limitations, basic 8-digit calculations are possible, meeting your daily needs.
Weather Function: Real-time local weather information keeps you informed about climate changes and helps you stay prepared.
Camera and Music Control: Quickly snap photos and manage music playback during workouts or daily activities for added convenience.
Adjustable Screen Brightness: Customize the screen brightness based on different environments to protect your eyesight and ensure optimal display quality.
Breathing Training: Relax your body and mind through breathing exercises, enhancing focus.
Sedentary Reminder: Remind you to get up and move after prolonged sitting, preventing health issues associated with sedentary lifestyles.
Hydration Reminder: Timely reminders to drink water help maintain hydration levels and promote overall health.
Custom Date and Time: Set the date and time format according to your preference, catering to different regional habits and making the device more personalized for your needs.
Any issues? No worry, we are committed to providing you with the best service and ensuring your satisfaction.

title: Apple Watch Series 9 [GPS + Cellular 45mm] Smartwatch with Pink Aluminum Case with Pink Sport Band S/M. Fitness Tracker, Blood Oxygen & ECG Apps, Always-On Retina Display
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
features: WHY APPLE WATCH SERIES 9 — Your essential companion for a healthy life is now even more powerful. The S9 chip enables a superbright display and a magical new way to quickly and easily interact with your Apple Watch without touching the screen. Advanced health, safety, and activity features provide powerful insights and help when you need it. And redesigned apps in watchOS give you more information at a glance.
CARBON NEUTRAL — An aluminum Apple Watch Series 9 paired with the latest Sport Loop is carbon neutral. Learn more about Apple’s commitment to the environment at apple.com/2030.

CELLULAR CONNECTIVITY — Send a text, make a call, and stream music without your iPhone nearby. Use Family Setup to manage Apple Watch for family members who don’t yet have their own iPhone, so everyone can stay connected, active, healthy, and safe.

ADVANCED HEALTH FEATURES — Keep an eye on your blood oxygen. Take an ECG anytime. Get notifications if you have an irregular heart rhythm. See how much time you spent in REM, Core, or Deep sleep with sleep stages. Temperature sensing provides insights into overall wellbeing and cycle tracking. And take note of your state of mind to help build emotional awareness and resilience.

A POWERFUL FITNESS PARTNER — The Workout app gives you a range of ways to train plus advanced metrics for more insights about your workout performance. And Apple Watch comes with three months of Apple Fitness+ free.

INNOVATIVE SAFETY FEATURES — Fall Detection and Crash Detection can connect you with emergency services in the event of a hard fall or a severe car crash. And Emergency SOS lets you call for help with the press of a button.

SIMPLY COMPATIBLE — It works seamlessly with your Apple devices and services. Unlock your Mac automatically. Get approximate distance and directions to your iPhone with Precision Finding on supported iPhone models. Pay and send money with Apple Pay. Apple Watch requires iPhone XS or later with the latest iOS version.
EASILY CUSTOMIZABLE — With watch bands in a range of styles, materials, and colors and fully customizable watch faces, you can change your watch to fit your mood or the moment.
INCREDIBLE DURABILITY — Tougher than tough. It’s crack resistant, IP6X-certified dust resistant, and swimproof with 50m water resistance.
LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See below to learn more.

title: Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch with Rugged Titanium Case & Olive Alpine Loop Small. Fitness Tracker, Precision GPS, Action Button, Extra-Long Battery Life, Carbon Neutral
inStockText: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
features: CARBON NEUTRAL — Apple Watch Ultra 2 paired with the latest Alpine Loop or Trail Loop is carbon neutral. Learn more about Apple’s commitment to the environment at apple.com/2030.

WHY APPLE WATCH ULTRA 2 — Rugged, capable, and built to meet the demands of endurance athletes, outdoor adventurers, and water sport enthusiasts — with a specialized band for each. The S9 SiP enables a superbright display and a magical new way to quickly and easily interact with your Apple Watch without touching the display. Up to 36 hours of battery life and 72 hours in Low Power Mode.

EXTREMELY RUGGED, INCREDIBLY CAPABLE — 49mm corrosion-resistant titanium case. Large Digital Crown and Customizable Action button for instant control over a variety of functions. 100m water resistance.

BIGGEST, BRIGHTEST DISPLAY YET — Apple’s brightest Always-On Retina display is easy to see, even in direct sunlight. More room for adding complications to customize your watch face and enough space to view six metrics at once.
THE FREEDOM OF CELLULAR — Cellular is built in. You can call and text without your iPhone, even overseas with international roaming. Stream your favorite music and podcasts. Get directions with Maps.

FOR ATHLETES — Advanced metrics and views in the Workout app, including Heart Rate Zones, custom workouts, and new cycling workout views. Precision dual-frequency GPS provides incredible accuracy for calculating distance, pace, and route maps. Trail Loop is a light, thin, and flexible band, designed especially for all workout types.

FOR OUTDOOR ADVENTURERS — The Compass app delivers helpful views and details like elevation, incline, longitude, and latitude. See the last place where you had cellular reception. Mark your location with Compass Waypoints. Backtrack uses GPS to map where you’ve been so you can retrace your steps. Alpine Loop is an extremely rugged and secure band to meet the needs of all outdoor adventurers.

FOR WATER SPORTS ENTHUSIASTS — Made for recreational water sports, scuba, and free diving for descents to 40 meters. The Depth app shows the time, current depth, water temperature, duration under water, and maximum depth you’ve reached. The Oceanic+ app puts a dive computer on your wrist. Ocean Band is light and flexible, with a titanium buckle and adjustable loop for a secure fit even during high-speed water sports.

ADVANCED HEALTH AND SAFETY FEATURES — Heart health notifications, the Blood Oxygen app, and the ECG app keep you informed and empowered when it comes to your health. Fall Detection and Crash Detection can connect you with emergency services in the event of a hard fall or a severe car crash. Hold the Action button to activate a siren that can be heard up to 600 feet away.
LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See below to learn more.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Fitness tracker with modern and versatile design shines a light in your healthy life, outside and in. 
Embark on a fitness journey with our latest smart fitness tracker watch. Packed with versatile features and a sleek design, this fitness watch is not just a device; it's your fitness ally, lifestyle manager, and health companion, all rolled into one. 
Customize your own watch face，set one that fit your style most. 
1.47-inch Ultra-HD Full Touch Screen 
--Immerse yourself in crystal-clear visuals, providing an intuitive and responsive interface that keeps you in control of your fitness metrics and settings at the touch of your fingertips. 
More Than 150 Watch Faces Options 
--Express your unique style every day with over 150 watch faces in the App. Whether you're feeling bold, minimalist, or trendy, there's a design for every mood and occasion. Keep your wrist as dynamic as your lifestyle. 
Customize the Watch Face with any Photos in Your Phone Album 
--You could upload your favorite Photos in your phone album as your watch face, such as those of your family, pets, idols, etc. 
On-wrist tracking and in-app insights for health metrics. 
Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen, and Blood Pressure Monitoring 
--Stay ahead of your health goals with advanced tracking features, including heart rate, blood pressure, and blood oxygen monitoring. The fitness tracker is your personal health assistant, providing real-time insights to help you make informed decisions about your well-being. 
Intelligent Sleep Tracking and Analysis 
--Wear this fitness tracker to bed to automatically track basic stats about your sleep, including your time asleep, sleep stages (time spent light sleep, deep sleep, and REM), and sleep duration of time, which helps you to understand your sleep patterns, receive personalized insights, and wake up feeling refreshed and ready to conquer the day. 
More than 120 Sports Modes with GPS Connectivity and All-day activity tracking. 
It could track more than 120 specific sports activities including walking, running, cycling, skipping, swimming, yoga, climbing, tennis, free training and more for real-time hear rate, steps, calories burned, distance, time of duration and more.
The fitness tracker watch for women and men tracks your all day activity automatically including walking steps, distance and calories burned, ensures no achievement goes unnoticed on your fitness journey.
With GPS connectivity to the App, you can map your routes, track your pace, and analyze your performance.
Call, text, and app notifications 
Stay connected without missing a beat! Receive call, text, and app notifications directly on your wrist. The smart watch for android phones and iPhone keeps you in the loop, even during your most intense workouts. 
Receive a buzzing notification from your wrist for incoming calls, text and app messages including Facebook,Twitter, WhatsApp, Linkedin, Messenger and more. With this smart watch, you could concentrate on your workouts and never worry about missing important calls or messages.
For incoming calls, you could check the caller’s name or phone number on the watch. You could tap the watch screen to reject the call or mute the phone ringtone.
For text and app messages, except for a buzzing notification on your wrist, you could also read the whole messages on your watch directly.
(Note: This fitness watch can't be used to answer calls or reply messages） 
Life-Enhancing Reminders and Versatile Features 
Life-Enhancing Reminders 
--Never miss a beat with thoughtful reminders designed to elevate your daily routine. From menstrual cycle tracking to staying hydrated with drinking water reminders, the Ultra-HD Fitness Tracker ensures you're always in tune with your body's needs. 
Sedentary Reminder 
--Get up and move to break those prolonged periods of inactivity. 
Weather Updates 
--Stay informed about the weather, allowing you to plan your outdoor activities seamlessly. 
Timer and Alarm 
--Keep your schedule on track with customizable timers and alarms. 
Camera and Music Control 
--Capture the perfect moments and control your music playback directly from your wrist. 
Do Not Disturb Mode 
--Find your zen by silencing notifications during crucial moments. 
Long Battery Life 
--Each full charge supports 7 days heavy use or 10 days daily use. Its standby time is up to 30 days, ensuring it keeps up with your active lifestyle. 
IP68 Waterproof 
--Dive into your workouts with confidence. The fitness tracker for women and men is IP68 waterproof, allowing you to sweat it out, swim, or face any weather conditions without missing a beat. 
Brightness Adjustment 
--Adapt to any environment with the brightness adjustment feature. Whether you're in broad daylight or winding down in the evening, adjust the screen to ensure optimal visibility.

SIMPLY COMPATIBLE — It works seamlessly with your Apple devices and services. Unlock your Mac automatically. Find your devices with a tap. Pay and send money with Apple Pay. Apple Watch requires an iPhone 8 or later with the latest iOS version.

description: Run at a higher level with the Forerunner® 255 smartwatch. These running smartwatches help you train and recover smarter with training status, running power, multi-band GPS and daily suggested workouts that adapt to your performance and goals. Plus, other new features — such as race widget — help you plan your race-day strategy, and morning report with HRV status reveals your overall health alongside the day ahead. And with Garmin Pay™ contactless payments with a supported card, it’s never been easier to buy that post-workout coffee — no matter how you work out — with more than 30 activity profiles, including triathlon, cycling, swimming and more. With Forerunner 255, you can get a continuous picture of your health, from training and recovery to sleep quality and overall wellness — and with up to 14 days of battery life in smartwatch mode and up to 30 hours in GPS mode.
features: Built with a slim design and an always-on, full-color display that’s light on the wrist and easy to read even in direct sunlight — with available sizes of 46 mm and 41 mm
Forerunner 255 Music provides up to 14 days of battery life in smartwatch mode and up to 30 hours in GPS mode for a full picture of your health — from sleep to training

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The 2024 Latest Smart Fitness Watch: Your Everyday Health Companion and More! 
Are you ready to elevate your lifestyle with cutting-edge technology, sleek design, and comprehensive health tracking? Meet this 2024 latest smart fitness watch, meticulously designed for today’s tech-savvy and health-conscious individuals. This fitness tracker watch does so much more than just tell time—it’s your personal fitness coach, health tracker, communication hub, and lifestyle assistant—all wrapped up into one powerful wearable device. 
Whether you’re hitting the gym, managing a busy workday, or just looking to stay healthier and more organized, this smartwatch will become an indispensable part of your daily life. And with its long battery life, waterproof design, and vast array of customizable features, it’s built to keep up with you every step of the way. 
Stunning Visual and Operational Experience 
Ultra HD Full Touch Color Screen 
The moment you set eyes on the ultra-HD full touch color screen, you’ll realize this is no ordinary watch. With crystal-clear visuals, a vibrant color palette, and a smooth user interface, this smartwatch brings every interaction to life. Its high-resolution display ensures every swipe, tap, and notification is easy to read, whether you’re indoors or out in bright sunlight. 
More Than 200 Dial Options 
Love personalization? Choose from more than 200 dial options! From classic and elegant to fun and modern, you can switch up the look of your watch to match your style, mood, or occasion. You’ll never have to settle for one look again! 
Comprehensive Health Tracking 
24/7 Heart Rate Monitoring 
Your heart is the center of your well-being, and this smartwatch monitors it continuously. With 24/7 heart rate monitoring, you can stay on top of your cardiovascular health no matter where life takes you. Whether you're resting, working out, or somewhere in between, this advanced heart rate sensor provides accurate, real-time insights into your heart's performance. 
Blood Oxygen Monitoring 
In today’s fast-paced world, understanding your body’s oxygen levels is essential for maintaining overall wellness. The fitness tracker for women and men allows you to keep track of your blood oxygen saturation, an important indicator of your respiratory health. Perfect for athletes, mountain climbers, or anyone who wants to monitor their oxygen levels on-the-go! 
Blood Pressure Monitoring 
The blood pressure monitoring feature on the smart fitness watches helps you keep an eye on one of the most critical indicators of heart health. This functionality enables you to measure your blood pressure anytime, anywhere, giving you valuable insights into how your body reacts to daily activities. 
Sleep Tracking 
Waking up tired after a full night of sleep? The sleep tracker is here to help. By monitoring your sleep stages—light sleep, deep sleep, and REM—this feature provides you with detailed insights into your nightly rest. It helps you understand your sleep quality and offers recommendations on how to improve your overall sleep health. Start your days feeling refreshed, energized, and ready to conquer the world! 
Stay Connected with Calls andMessages Notification 
Stay in the loop, even when you’re on the go. With calls and messages notifications, you’ll never miss an important call, text, or app notification again. Receive notifications from social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and more—right on your wrist. Whether it's a quick glance at an incoming call or checking your messages discreetly during a meeting, this feature ensures that you’re always connected without needing to constantly check your phone. 
All-Day Activity Tracking and 128 Exercise Modes: Designed to Motivate You 
Track Your Fitness Journey with 128 Exercise Modes 
Whether you're a casual walker or an elite athlete, the 128 exercise modes tracking feature has something for everyone. This smartwatch is designed to accurately track a wide variety of exercises, from running and cycling to yoga, swimming, and strength training. Whatever your workout style, the fitness trackers adapt to your needs, giving you real-time data on your performance and helping you stay motivated. 
Each activity is analyzed through advanced sensors, providing you with metrics such as calories burned, steps taken, distance traveled, and heart rate during the exercise. Sync your data with the App and watch yourself reach new fitness milestones! 
All-Day Activity Tracking for a Healthier You 
Even when you’re not working out, this fitness watch works for you. With All-Day Activity Tracking, every step counts toward a healthier lifestyle. It tracks your steps, calories burned, distance covered, and active minutes throughout the day. You can set daily activity goals and watch your progress in real-time, pushing you to stay active and fit. Whether you're walking to work or taking a leisurely stroll in the park, this health activity tracker watch is there to keep you moving. 
Mutiple Notifications and Reminders 
Women’s Health: Menstrual Period Reminder 
For women, this heath fitness watch takes health tracking a step further with its Menstrual Period Reminder feature. It helps you track your menstrual cycle and provides helpful reminders for the different phases, ensuring you're always informed and prepared. This feature is a fantastic tool for women seeking to understand their bodies better and manage their health more effectively. 
Drinking Water Reminder 
It’s easy to forget to drink water during a busy day or while focusing on work. But now, with the Drinking Water Reminder, your smartwatch ensures you stay hydrated. Set up reminders that prompt you to drink water at regular intervals, keeping your body hydrated and your energy levels high. 
Sedentary Reminder 
If you’re sitting for too long, the sedentary reminder will nudge you to stand up, stretch, and move around. These gentle reminders help promote better posture, circulation, and overall well-being. 
Your Daily Assistant: Multiple Functions to Simplify Your Life 
Long Battery Life: Power Through Your Day 
There’s nothing worse than your device dying halfway through the day. Thankfully, the long battery life of this smart watch ensures that you stay powered up for days on a single charge. With up to 7-12 days of battery life (depending on usage), you can enjoy uninterrupted access to all the features you love without constantly worrying about recharging. Now, you can focus on your day, not your charger. 
IP68 Waterproof: Ready for Anything 
Whether you’re swimming, caught in the rain, or just washing your hands, you don’t have to worry about damaging your fitness watch. Rated with IP68 waterproof protection, this smartwatch is designed to withstand the toughest conditions. It’s built to be water-resistant and dustproof, allowing you to wear it with confidence in almost any situation—whether you’re poolside or diving into a workout session. 
Multiple Functions to Simplify Your Life 
This fitness tracker watch is more than just a health and fitness tracker. With multiple functions, it’s your ultimate personal assistant. Enjoy features like a Timer, Stopwatch, Alarm Clock, and even a Find Your Phone option when your phone goes missing. Plus, you can control your music on-the-go with the Music Control feature, making it easy to switch tracks without reaching for your phone. 
Stay ahead of the weather with the Weat her Forecast feature, and keep distractions at bay with Don’t Disturb Mode, which lets you block unnecessary alerts whenever you need focus time. You can also adjust the screen’s brightness for the perfect view in any lighting condition and even use the Camera Control feature to snap hands-free photos.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Jawploy 
Tech for life! 
Charging Method 
This activity tracker requires iOS 9.0 & Android 4.4 above, Bluetooth 5.0 (Smartphone only, not compatible with iPad, PC or Tablet) 
Tips 1: In consideration of the unconscious wrists flipping during use, we have some restrictions on the function of “wrists flipping to lighten screen”. If you are standing, it is recommended that your hand lift the wrists naturally from the side of your body to watch the screen (the screen should be horizontal as much as possible). If you are sitting, you can turn the wrists 90 ° outwards and then turn them inwards (the screen should be horizontal as much as possible). It is recommended to try more to grasp the best angle. 
Tips 2: The Bluetooth distance of fitness tracker is 10m(32.8 feet). If the Bluetooth connection is disconnected, it is recommended to unbind the device in the app, and then rebind it to restore the connection (no data usage will be affected). 
Tips 3: To ensure your app can track your data and your watch can receive notification, you need open related authority of app in your phone and keep app working in backstage even screen closed. Please read the manual for the reason why your app can't work in the backstage. 
You can get more colors of watch bands by Search: Jawploy S5 fitness tracker bands 
Features 
Health Assistant 
Jawploy fitness tracker tracks your 24-hour heart rate/blood pressure/sleep/calorie and other data. Keeps your data recorded on the app by adopting the innovative Matter Sensing & Control Technology, knowing your body all the time. 
Sports tracking 
Jawploy activity tracker smart watch tracks your daily activity from day to night. In 16 sports mode, it can record your various data, like walking distance, steps, heart rate, calorie burning, etc. 
One tap to test all the health data. 
Drink Water Reminder & Countdown Function 
Jawploy fitness tracker can remind you to drink water.( need turn on this function in the Runmefit APP) Activity tracker can also be used like a normal watch, you can use the countdown or many other functions when necessary. 
Features 
Sedentary Reminder & Sleep Monitor 
Jawploy activity tracker monitor your sleep every night (9 pm-9 am). Record the time of your deep sleep, shallow sleep and wake up. Help you have a better arrange of your resting time. Fitness tracker can also remind you to stand, help you stay active and reduce stress. (You can set in Runmefit APP) 
Smart Connectivity 
It is easy to receive text messages, emails, many apps messages and call notifications on your fitness tracker. Help you enhanced your working efficiency. (SMS or SNS from Facebook, Linked in, WhatsApp, Wechat, Twitter, Snapchat, Instagram, Messenger, Wechat, QQ, Skype, Line and so on.) 
Explore More function! 
Remote camera? Phone locator? Not only a simple tracker or pedometer/step counter, you can find more function to enjoy! It’s cool to design your own smart watch with customizable watch face, use in any environment with real IP68 waterproof fitness tracker.(running in rains and washing hands, showering, swimming, or diving in shallow water) 
How to connect 
Troubleshooting 
About connection: 
- To keep connection, lock app in phone backstage even screen closed, related authority is required. 
- If disconnected, please unlock your phone screen, wait 6-10s, it will re-connect automatically (as long as app is working in backstage). If not (BT signal maybe hidden in some smartphone), please re-connect in app manually. 
- If disconnect for too long, re-connect manually in app. 
Q1. Why my Jawploy fitness tracker could not be turn on? 
When you get the Jawploy fitness tracker, long press the touch point(on the bottom of screen, rectangle) for 5 seconds, if it still cannot be turned on, it means that the watch is out of power. Please charge it to activate. 
Q2. How to charge the Jawploy activity tracker? 
Both 2 sides of watch band can be removed, but only one side with metal piece can be charged. When starting charging, watch will vibrate once, and the charging icon will show on screen. If not, try to rotate the watch body(turn around) to the opposite , then try to insert again. 
Q3. How to set the date and time of Jawploy fitness tracker smart watch? 
The Jawploy fitness tracker will automatically synchronize the time and date with your phone after connection. When the fitness tracker is out of power, there may be an error in [time] when you operate it again. After the battery is fully charged, please connect your phone again, it will automatically synchronize the time to the right one. 
Q4. Why the notification function not working when I using? How make it work? 
Please follow the reminder in app when your FIRST CONNECTION, open all the related authority of app in phone and keep app working in backstage even screen closed. You can also WATCH THE VIDEO: youtu.be/J3oBwv0NmbQ to understand how to use this item clearly. Especially when you got problem about PAIR WATCH WITH PHONE. 
Q5. What about the accuracy of step count data? 
To ensure the data accuracy, you need wear the watch close to your skin, and the strap should be one finger away from the wrist. 
The three-axis accelerometer is used in the wristband, and the error is about 2%, that's normal for deviation. And any kind of fitness tracker counts steps by hand moving when you walking, the step counts data needs some time to update when you walking a while. If you walking less than 20 steps in a period, the step counter would not count. (To reduce the wrong count when you working and sleeping)

You can get more colors of watch bands by Search: Jawploy S5 fitness tracker bands

modules.title: How to connect  Troubleshooting
modules.text:
About connection: 
- To keep connection, lock app in phone backstage even screen closed, related authority is required. 
- If disconnected, please unlock your phone screen, wait 6-10s, it will re-connect automatically (as long as app is working in backstage). If not (BT signal maybe hidden in some smartphone), please re-connect in app manually. 
- If disconnect for too long, re-connect manually in app. 
Q1. Why my Jawploy fitness tracker could not be turn on? 
When you get the Jawploy fitness tracker, long press the touch point(on the bottom of screen, rectangle) for 5 seconds, if it still cannot be turned on, it means that the watch is out of power. Please charge it to activate. 
Q2. How to charge the Jawploy activity tracker? 
Both 2 sides of watch band can be removed, but only one side with metal piece can be charged. When starting charging, watch will vibrate once, and the charging icon will show on screen. If not, try to rotate the watch body(turn around) to the opposite , then try to insert again. 
Q3. How to set the date and time of Jawploy fitness tracker smart watch? 
The Jawploy fitness tracker will automatically synchronize the time and date with your phone after connection. When the fitness tracker is out of power, there may be an error in [time] when you operate it again. After the battery is fully charged, please connect your phone again, it will automatically synchronize the time to the right one. 
Q4. Why the notification function not working when I using? How make it work? 
Please follow the reminder in app when your FIRST CONNECTION, open all the related authority of app in phone and keep app working in backstage even screen closed. You can also WATCH THE VIDEO: youtu.be/J3oBwv0NmbQ to understand how to use this item clearly. Especially when you got problem about PAIR WATCH WITH PHONE. 
Q5. What about the accuracy of step count data? 
To ensure the data accuracy, you need wear the watch close to your skin, and the strap should be one finger away from the wrist. 
The three-axis accelerometer is used in the wristband, and the error is about 2%, that's normal for deviation. And any kind of fitness tracker counts steps by hand moving when you walking, the step counts data needs some time to update when you walking a while. If you walking less than 20 steps in a period, the step counter would not count. (To reduce the wrong count when you working and sleeping)

title: Fitness Tracker 2024 (Answer/Make Call),Smart Watch with 24/7 Heart Rate Blood Oxygen Monitor,Sleep Tracker,100+ Sports Modes,Pedometer,IP68 Waterproof Activity Trackers for Android&iPhone Women Men
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Fitness Technology › Activity & Fitness Trackers
features: 👍【Answer/Make Calls and AI Voice Assistant】Blackview fitness watch come with built-in HiFi stereo speakers and microphone. Once connected to Bluetooth, you can directly answer or make calls through the smartwatch. The "Da Fit" app stores multiple contacts, ensuring you stay connected with family and friends anytime, anywhere. Receive real-time notifications on the smartwatch for incoming calls or messages (WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, etc.). Speak to the AI voice assistant for quick help, such as weather forecast, making calls, setting alarms etc.

👍【DIY Watch Faces & 2 Pack Watch Straps】Fashionable smartwatches for men and women are constructed from a special aluminum alloy material, which comes with two types of watch straps - Nylon watch straps and silicone watch straps. You can choose the background image for your watch face (your family, pets, or other photos that you like), and download and use it through the "Da Fit" app on the 1.85-inch full-touch HD screen. The system offers over 100 watch faces to choose from as well.

👍【100+ Sports Modes】With more than 100 sports modes, this fitness tracker supports running, cycling, walking, climbing, yoga, skiing, football, and more. It tracks your daily data such as steps, time, distance, and calories, and connects to the GPS on your phone to record all your training routes and fitness using the "Da Fit" app to further motivate yourself to complete your exercise plan. It's an IP68 waterproof device that can meet your daily needs. (*NOTE: Not for sauna, hot water, swim, diving)

👍【Monitor Health in Real Time】The fitness watch for women and men uses high-performance optical sensors to monitor dynamic heart rate in real time 24/7. It can also accurately track your personal sleep and detect blood oxygen saturation and stress levels to adjust your physical condition in a timely manner. The app even offers a detailed sleep quality analysis report (light/deep/awake sleep stage), helping you adjust your lifestyle towards a healthier lifestyle. (*NOTE: This watch cannot be used as a medical diagnostic tool.)

👍【More Smart Tools】Apart from the features mentioned above, this smartwatch also offers other useful daily functions such as smart notifications, music control, camera control, casual games, weather forecast, sedentary reminders, alarm clock, stopwatch, timer, etc. Compatible with most Android 6.0 and iOS 9.0 or above smartphones, it comes with a built-in large capacity battery of 350mAh, which ensures up to 7 days of use and approximately 30 days of standby with just 2 hours of charging.

📞【2-Year Warranty】We stand behind our product and offer a 2-year warranty along with 24/7 lifetime tech support for your hassle-free purchase. Please feel free to reach out to us for any problems you encounter.
🎁 Fantastic Gift for Your Family and Friends💝

title: Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS 40mm] Smartwatch with Midnight Aluminium Case with Midnight Sport Band S/M. Fitness and Sleep Trackers, Crash Detection, Heart Rate Monitor, Retina Display
features: WHY APPLE WATCH SE — All the essentials to help you be motivated and active, keep connected, track your health, and stay safe. watchOS 11 brings more intelligence, personalization, and connectivity. With features like Fall Detection and enhanced workout metrics, Apple Watch SE is an incredible value.
STAY CONNECTED — Send a text, take a call, listen to music and podcasts, use Siri, or call for help with Emergency SOS.* Apple Watch SE (GPS) works with your iPhone or Wi-Fi to keep you connected.

HEALTH AND SAFETY FEATURES — Get insights into your health, including notifications if you have an irregular heart rhythm* or an unusually high or low heart rate. Get help when you need it with Fall Detection, Crash Detection, and Emergency SOS.* Automatically notify loved ones when you arrive at your destination with Check In.*
SIMPLY COMPATIBLE — It works seamlessly with your Apple devices and services.* Unlock your Mac automatically. Find your devices easily. Pay and send money with Apple Pay.
SWIMPROOF AND FASHIONABLE — 50m water resistance.* Three finishes. And a color-matched back case made with a production process that reduces its carbon emissions.
EASILY CUSTOMIZABLE — With watch bands in a range of styles, materials, and colors and fully customizable watch faces, you can change your watch to fit your mood or the moment.

A GREAT FITNESS PARTNER — The Workout app gives you a range of ways to train plus advanced metrics for more insights into your workout performance. And Apple Watch comes with three months of Apple Fitness+ free.*
APPLE WATCH FOR YOUR KIDS — Set up Apple Watch for those who don’t yet have their own iPhone, so everyone can stay connected, active, healthy, and safe.*
CARBON NEUTRAL — Apple Watch SE (2nd generation) is carbon neutral when paired with select bands. Learn more about Apple’s commitment to the environment at apple.com/2030.
Compatibility: iPhone Xs or later with iOS 17 or later

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
FFFITNES: Smart Wear Create A New Lifestyle 
FFFITNES smart wearable devices pursue the perfect combination of appearance and function, so that every user of our products can have a smarter and more convenient lifestyle. 
Smart Message Notification & Vibration Reminder 
Supports Multiple Applications：This smart bracelet has call reminders, SMS notifications, and supports message reminders from 29 social software such as Tiktok, Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, etc. It has a wide compatibility. 
5 Levels of Vibration Mode：You can turn the vibration mode off or on according to your needs and occasions, and there are 5 different levels of vibration intensity for you to choose from. 
24/7 Comprehensive Health & Activity Tracking 
Heart Rate Monitor: Real-time record of your exercise and rest status to prevent accidents.
Pressure Monitor: Evaluate based on multiple data to remind you to pay attention to rest and proper relaxation.
Blood Oxygen Monitor: Real-time monitoring to avoid over-exercise and over-fatigue, reminding you to stay calm.
Sleep Tracker: Continuously record your sleep status, analyze your sleep quality, and provide an analysis report every week.
▸You can give it as a gift to your family members, loved ones to take care of them on your behalf. 
Professional Fitness & Sports Partner 
If you are a sports enthusiast, you can choose from 29 sports modes such as basketball, badminton, running, swimming, etc. according to your preferences, which basically covers all types of sports. 
Exercise Goal Setting & Real-Time Data Feedback 
▸It can be your fitness partner： 
You can set your exercise goals before exercising, such as steps, calories, distance, exercise duration and other data, and you can view them in real time to arrange your exercise amount reasonably. 
IP68 Waterproof & Multiple Practical Functions 
The 1.47" high-definition display and more than 100 exquisite dials make this smart band meet the needs of fashion. At the same time, it has many convenient functions such as IP68 waterproof, weather forecast, sedentary reminder, alarm clock, mobile phone search, music control, etc., which can help you save a lot of time. 
Women's Health Tracking 
Care about the healthy life of every woman. You can use this app to track your menstrual time and situation, record menstrual changes, predict ovulation, and understand your physical condition in more detail.

title: ZURURU Fitness Tracker with Blood Pressure Heart Rate Sleep Health Monitor for Men and Women, Upgraded Waterproof Activity Tracker Watch, Step Calorie Counter Pedometer
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Fitness Technology › Activity & Fitness Trackers
features: All-day Activity Tracker: Stay on top of your health with ZURURU's IP68 Waterproof Fitness Tracker. Track daily steps, calories, exercise distance, and time while monitoring heart rate and blood pressure. With smart notifications accessible via the H Band app, you'll have your health data at your fingertips.

Call and Message Notifications: Never miss an important call or message again. Receive call, text, and SNS notifications (Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Instagram) right on your wrist. With Bluetooth enabled, the watch vibrates to alert you of new messages, ensuring you stay connected.

Sleep Monitoring and Fitness Tracking: More than just an activity tracker, ZURURU monitors your sleep patterns including awake time, deep sleep, and light sleep. With insights available on the H Band app, adjust your lifestyle to meet your fitness goals more effectively.

Multiple Sports Modes & Connected GPS: Enhance your workout with 11 exercise modes and Connected GPS. Track detailed stats including pace, distance, and even map your route for a comprehensive overview of your fitness journey.

Fast and Easy Charging: Simplify your routine with the built-in USB plug of this fitness tracker. A quick charge of just 1-2 hours powers the device for an entire week. Detach the band to easily charge at any USB port, eliminating the need for cumbersome cables.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Key Features 
✔ Tracking of heart rate, blood pressure, steps, calories burned, sleeping, distance and duration, goal setting with achievement celebration. 
✔ Stylish design - HD color screen with 4 different home screen styles, 12-hour or 24-hour time display format. date, week, steps/heart rate all display on one home screen. 
✔ Smart notifications right on your wrist - The tracker will vibrate to alert your when there is an incoming phone call, SMS text and SNS messages including Facebook,Twitter, WhatsApp, Linkedin, Messenger. 
✔ IP68 Waterproof - You can wear it when swimming or diving (can't track swimming data). 
✔ Sedentary alert - It gives you gentle reminders to stay active throughout the day if you are stationary for too long. 
✔ Long battery life and no need a charging cable. 
✔ Remote camera shooting - It takes a photo remotely using your tracker. 
✔ 11 Sport modes: Outdoor Run, Outdoor Walk, Indoor Run, Indoor Walk, Hiking, Stair Stepper, Outdoor Cycle, Stationary Bike, Elliptical, Rowing Machine and Swim. 
More Functions 
GPS routes in App / 20 alarms setting / Wrist sense / Physiological period reminder / Stopwatch / Countdown timer / Find phone / Disconnection alert / Replaceable and washable strap with secure clasp. 
One Screen is Enough 
The easy-to-use & color screen ZURURU fitness tracker packs all the features you need to monitor your health and exercise even without a mobile phone. Strap it on, keep it on, and go! 
Step Counting 
It tracks daily walking steps on your wrist, accurately and reliably measures your steps, calculates distance and calories burned. 
HR Monitoring 
24/7 continuous heart-rate monitoring, it ensures you’re in the proper HR zone when exercising and helps you achieve your fitness goals more efficiently. It also alerts you when your heart rate exceeds the limit you set. 
Sleep Tracking 
It automatically measures your fall asleep, awake times, light and deep sleep, then review your sleep quality and duration in the App. You’ll get each morning to wake up with light vibrating alarm. 
Sedentary Alert 
If your tracker senses you haven’t moved in prolonged period of time, it will even remind you to get active! 
Smart Notification 
Connects to your smartphone and receives notifications for texts, calls and social media. 
Camera Control 
Turn on remote control camera in APP, you can take photos by shaking the hand, so convenient, brings more fun to you. 
Waterproof 
IP 68 Waterproof rating allows the fitness tracker to be used in showering, swimming, running and diving up to 3 meters. 
Female Health Tracking 
Physiological period reminder, it helps you recognize any recurring irregularities and identify menstrual patterns. 
Distance Tracking 
It automatically tracks the distance you are walking or running. Calculate distance and share your GPS routes in App. 
Stop Watch 
The built-in Stopwatch feature lets you track the time you spend on each task. Make time tracking easier and more precise. 
Kindly Note 
Our support team is ready to assist you to solve the problem you met.（7/24）Please check the user guide for details.

Here's how to charge the watch: 
1. The correct way to remove the strap: hold your thumb against the bottom edge of the screen and the index finger is slanting downwards. 
2. Separate the main body and the strap (Pull out the strap), you will see the metal pins and put the metal pins into USB port then the it will charge. 
3. Before you charge, please clean the pins so that they will fully touch with your charging ports, there will be a charging icon on the screen, if not, please change the charger to the opposite direction or change the USB charging port to try again. 
(Note: When you use your watch for the first time, please charge it to activate it.)

title: Garmin fēnix® 8 – 51 mm, AMOLED, Sapphire, Premium Multisport GPS Smartwatch, Long-Lasting Battery Life, Dive-Rated, Built-in LED Flashlight, Carbon Gray DLC Titanium with Pebble Gray Band
inStockText: Only 11 left in stock (more on the way).  Only 11 left in stock (more on the way).
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Fitness Technology › Activity & Fitness Trackers
description: Be limitless. The fēnix® 8 multisport GPS smartwatch is built for serious athletes and outdoor adventurers who want to push beyond their limits. It features a big, bright 1.4” AMOLED display with scratch-resistant sapphire lens, durable titanium bezel and powerful built-in LED flashlight for after-dark visibility. A built-in speaker and mic enable you to make and take calls from your wrist when your watch is paired to your smartphone. Power up your body’s performance, endurance and resistance to injury with the latest in targeted strength training plans plus a full range of sport-specific workouts. Performance insights help manage your exertion and build stamina, while training readiness features show how much recovery time you need between workouts, based on 24/7 health and wellness monitoring of heart rate, respiration, stress, sleep and more (data presented is intended to be a close estimation of metrics tracked). Take to the trails with built-in ABC sensors and preloaded TopoActive maps. The dynamic round-trip routing feature helps simplify the planning of your runs or rides — letting you set your target distance and receive turn-by-turn directions that adjust to get you back to your start on schedule. Enjoy extended off-grid adventures with up to 29 days of battery life in smartwatch mode. Plus, a 40-meter dive rating and leakproof metal buttons let you reach new depths of adventure. Additional features include music storage, Garmin Pay™ contactless payments (with a supported country and payment network), smart notifications (compatible smartphone required) and more.

Your training readiness score is based on sleep quality, recovery, training load and HRV status to determine if you’re primed to go hard and reap the rewards (data presented is intended to be a close estimation of metrics tracked)

For your active lifestyle, a built-in speaker and mic let you make and take phone calls from your wrist when your watch is paired to your smartphone — and you can even use your smartphone’s voice assistant to respond to text messages and more

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The 2024 Latest Smart Fitness Watch: Your Everyday Health Companion and More! 
Are you ready to elevate your lifestyle with cutting-edge technology, sleek design, and comprehensive health tracking? Meet this 2024 latest smart fitness watch, meticulously designed for today’s tech-savvy and health-conscious individuals. This fitness tracker watch does so much more than just tell time—it’s your personal fitness coach, health tracker, communication hub, and lifestyle assistant—all wrapped up into one powerful wearable device. 
Whether you’re hitting the gym, managing a busy workday, or just looking to stay healthier and more organized, this smartwatch will become an indispensable part of your daily life. And with its long battery life, waterproof design, and vast array of customizable features, it’s built to keep up with you every step of the way. 
Stunning Visual and Operational Experience 
Ultra HD Full Touch Color Screen 
The moment you set eyes on the ultra-HD full touch color screen, you’ll realize this is no ordinary watch. With crystal-clear visuals, a vibrant color palette, and a smooth user interface, this smartwatch brings every interaction to life. Its high-resolution display ensures every swipe, tap, and notification is easy to read, whether you’re indoors or out in bright sunlight. 
More Than 200 Dial Options 
Love personalization? Choose from more than 200 dial options! From classic and elegant to fun and modern, you can switch up the look of your watch to match your style, mood, or occasion. You’ll never have to settle for one look again! 
Comprehensive Health Tracking 
24/7 Heart Rate Monitoring 
Your heart is the center of your well-being, and this smartwatch monitors it continuously. With 24/7 heart rate monitoring, you can stay on top of your cardiovascular health no matter where life takes you. Whether you're resting, working out, or somewhere in between, this advanced heart rate sensor provides accurate, real-time insights into your heart's performance. 
Blood Oxygen Monitoring 
In today’s fast-paced world, understanding your body’s oxygen levels is essential for maintaining overall wellness. The fitness tracker for women and men allows you to keep track of your blood oxygen saturation, an important indicator of your respiratory health. Perfect for athletes, mountain climbers, or anyone who wants to monitor their oxygen levels on-the-go! 
Blood Pressure Monitoring 
The blood pressure monitoring feature on the smart fitness watches helps you keep an eye on one of the most critical indicators of heart health. This functionality enables you to measure your blood pressure anytime, anywhere, giving you valuable insights into how your body reacts to daily activities. 
Sleep Tracking 
Waking up tired after a full night of sleep? The sleep tracker is here to help. By monitoring your sleep stages—light sleep, deep sleep, and REM—this feature provides you with detailed insights into your nightly rest. It helps you understand your sleep quality and offers recommendations on how to improve your overall sleep health. Start your days feeling refreshed, energized, and ready to conquer the world! 
Stay Connected with Calls andMessages Notification 
Stay in the loop, even when you’re on the go. With calls and messages notifications, you’ll never miss an important call, text, or app notification again. Receive notifications from social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and more—right on your wrist. Whether it's a quick glance at an incoming call or checking your messages discreetly during a meeting, this feature ensures that you’re always connected without needing to constantly check your phone. 
All-Day Activity Tracking and 128 Exercise Modes: Designed to Motivate You 
Track Your Fitness Journey with 128 Exercise Modes 
Whether you're a casual walker or an elite athlete, the 128 exercise modes tracking feature has something for everyone. This smartwatch is designed to accurately track a wide variety of exercises, from running and cycling to yoga, swimming, and strength training. Whatever your workout style, the fitness trackers adapt to your needs, giving you real-time data on your performance and helping you stay motivated. 
Each activity is analyzed through advanced sensors, providing you with metrics such as calories burned, steps taken, distance traveled, and heart rate during the exercise. Sync your data with the App and watch yourself reach new fitness milestones! 
All-Day Activity Tracking for a Healthier You 
Even when you’re not working out, this fitness watch works for you. With All-Day Activity Tracking, every step counts toward a healthier lifestyle. It tracks your steps, calories burned, distance covered, and active minutes throughout the day. You can set daily activity goals and watch your progress in real-time, pushing you to stay active and fit. Whether you're walking to work or taking a leisurely stroll in the park, this health activity tracker watch is there to keep you moving. 
Mutiple Notifications and Reminders 
Women’s Health: Menstrual Period Reminder 
For women, this heath fitness watch takes health tracking a step further with its Menstrual Period Reminder feature. It helps you track your menstrual cycle and provides helpful reminders for the different phases, ensuring you're always informed and prepared. This feature is a fantastic tool for women seeking to understand their bodies better and manage their health more effectively. 
Drinking Water Reminder 
It’s easy to forget to drink water during a busy day or while focusing on work. But now, with the Drinking Water Reminder, your smartwatch ensures you stay hydrated. Set up reminders that prompt you to drink water at regular intervals, keeping your body hydrated and your energy levels high. 
Sedentary Reminder 
If you’re sitting for too long, the sedentary reminder will nudge you to stand up, stretch, and move around. These gentle reminders help promote better posture, circulation, and overall well-being. 
Your Daily Assistant: Multiple Functions to Simplify Your Life 
Long Battery Life: Power Through Your Day 
There’s nothing worse than your device dying halfway through the day. Thankfully, the long battery life of this smart watch ensures that you stay powered up for days on a single charge. With up to 7-12 days of battery life (depending on usage), you can enjoy uninterrupted access to all the features you love without constantly worrying about recharging. Now, you can focus on your day, not your charger. 
IP68 Waterproof: Ready for Anything 
Whether you’re swimming, caught in the rain, or just washing your hands, you don’t have to worry about damaging your fitness watch. Rated with IP68 waterproof protection, this smartwatch is designed to withstand the toughest conditions. It’s built to be water-resistant and dustproof, allowing you to wear it with confidence in almost any situation—whether you’re poolside or diving into a workout session. 
Multiple Functions to Simplify Your Life 
This fitness tracker watch is more than just a health and fitness tracker. With multiple functions, it’s your ultimate personal assistant. Enjoy features like a Timer, Stopwatch, Alarm Clock, and even a Find Your Phone option when your phone goes missing. Plus, you can control your music on-the-go with the Music Control feature, making it easy to switch tracks without reaching for your phone. 
Stay ahead of the weather with the Weat her Forecast feature, and keep distractions at bay with Don’t Disturb Mode, which lets you block unnecessary alerts whenever you need focus time. You can also adjust the screen’s brightness for the perfect view in any lighting condition and even use the Camera Control feature to snap hands-free photos.
